Title: Creating Safe Spaces
Presenters: Nuri Gocay, April Nance, Scott Kennedy, Karen Morand, Dawn Kuczwara
Book Description: 'How can we create safe spaces for people of all varieties at the convention- and in our lives outside of fandom? Join a discussion with our staff (including the con chair) and those who have ideas on how we can do better on inclusivity and promoting consent.'
